lines.text: It's a man's world. They get everything out of it. I've told Fred hundreds of times, I'd never divorce him. No matter what he did, he couldn't make me divorce him. I'm his wife till death do us part - and I'm very healthy!
Be careful, Joyce. When a woman starts getting old, time can be the avalanche and loneliness - a disaster.

[to husband David]
You tell me what it's worth to be civilized...
